reviewText: The reason this item is discontinued is because it was an unauthorized bootleg. The German company thought they'd make some quick cash and that nobody would notice. Avoid!

BEWARE!  This is an unauthorized bootleg, and I should know - I am the lawyer who represents the intellectual property of Chuck Schuldiner & the band DEATH.  Buying this product would be a slap in the face of Chuck & his family, so please avoid.  We'll take all steps to have this product pulled.  Shame, shame. ERIC GREIF, Esq. (former manager of DEATH)
